title: Lakshmi Kasu Mala Pendant - A Divine Touch of Heritage
materials: Natural Emerald Beads. Features a Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting luster.
features: Exquisitely handcrafted pendant featuring Goddess Lakshmi seated on a lotus. The design incorporates intricate filigree work and is adorned with sparkling diamonds set in a delicate floral pattern. The pendant is finished with a string of smooth, vibrant emerald beads for added elegance. Features temple design, bringing a piece of South Indian heritage.
colors: Predominantly gold with the vibrant green of emeralds and the dazzling white of diamonds. A traditional and auspicious color combination in South Indian jewelry.
occasions: Seemantham or any occasion where traditional elegance is desired. Also a meaningful gift for loved ones.
description: This Lakshmi Kasu Mala Pendant is more than just a piece of jewelry; it's a symbol of prosperity and blessings. The intricate craftsmanship and the use of high-quality materials make it a valuable heirloom. The divine motif and the harmonious blend of gold, diamonds, and emeralds create a timeless piece that will be treasured for generations.
